## Event

## Checklist

- [ ] Event folder follows naming: `events/YYYY/MM/YYYY-MM-DD-city`
- [ ] Event `README.md` is filled out (date, location, Luma link, hosts)
- [ ] Speaker folders have `README.md`
- [ ] No video files committed (link to YouTube/recordings instead)
- [ ] Images compressed (< 2MB each)
- [ ] Luma event URL included in event README
